roleset.name: showing preference

example.name: Light Verb, all args
example.text: Don Quixote replied that, given her love for him, she should do him the favor of accepting the title of DON and call herself DOÃ‘A TOLOSA.
example.arg: of accepting the title of DON

example.name: arg1- preference
example.text: I read a lot of stuff about my generation eschewing suburban life in favor of living in cities , but I wonder what will happen when my peers have school - age children .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, favor.01. Corresponds to VNcls admire-31.2.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: What I really want to know is how is it that when judges rule in favor of equal marriage rights for all citizens it is " imposing " their views on citizens ?
